Product title: River Dream Cotton Blend No Hook Shower Curtain with Snap in Liner, Hotel Grade Shower Curtains for Bathroom, Water Repellent, White, 71W x74 L
Key Features: NO HOOK DESIGN: This shower curtain designed with "Split Rings" that let you hang them easily. No need to buy hooks and no need to remove the rod | HOTEL QUALITY: Made from a premium 35% cotton and 65% polyester blend, this heavyweight shower curtain offers both breathability and durability. The dense waffle weave provides a luxurious drape, while the bottom magnets ensure it stays securely in place for a spa-like experience | PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1 waffle shower curtain and 1 fabric snap-on replacement liner | DIMENSIONS: 71" width by 74" length fits your standard sized bathroom, snap in liner is 70" x 69" (WxL) | WATER REPELLENT: Made from premium materials, this hotel shower curtain repels water, preventing splashes and keeping your bathroom floor dry
comment 1: Beautiful sage green shower curtain! Love that it also comes with the liner so you don’t have to worry about that. The waffle texture is very soft and a good thickness which I expected for the price. Does what it needs to do while being cute. - gobulls2k
comment 2: Beautifully made shower curtain.  Looks very luxurious and expensive but very reasonably priced.  I was able to put it up in under 5 minutes because I didn't need shower hooks!  The description was spot on.  A good looking white woven curtain and the material is well weighted - not thin or flimsy.  Waterproof part is attached which is great.My only complaint would be that i have to hem it as I didn't realize that the length was so long and I certainly can't make the rod any lower.  However, It is such a great addition to my new bathroom that I will keep it and make it work for me. - Xx
comment 3: This is a really nice item. It goes on easily and looks and works great. - Katey
comment 4: Just great! The sage green is the perfect shade and the cotton is nice and heavy-good weight. And so easy to put up! I’m  so pleased with this shower curtain and it’s snap in liner. Thanks! - Vanity
comment 5: Needed a new shower curtain and I wanted one that looked like the ones you see in nice hotels. This waffle weave one fit the bill perfectly. Looks good, easy to install, easy to toss in the wash, the only thing that dropped this down is that the metal rounds at the bottom or way too light to keep the shower in place, so you get the wet cold plastic inner lining hitting your skin. However, my shower head uses a lot of air in it so it blows the water out which makes the curtain billow. If you don't have that type of showerhead then this should be a 5 star for you. - Vincent Smith
